author: Sarah Johnson
content: Excellent service! Our plumbing business saw a 40% increase in leads after using their marketing templates.

author: Michael Chen
content: Good analytics dashboard, but could use more detailed ROI breakdowns for medical practices.

author: Emily Rodriguez
content: The campaign wizard saved us hours of setup time. Our legal practice acquired 15 new clients last month!

author: David Thompson
content: Mobile responsive design needs improvement - some template elements looked distorted on smaller screens.

author: Linda Park
content: Effective social media scheduler, though the content suggestions could be more profession-specific.

author: James Wilson
content: The review-to-testimonial converter is a game changer! Our conversion rates improved dramatically.

author: Karen Miller
content: Had issues with API integration for our dental practice. Support response was slow.

author: Robert Smith
content: Great value for small businesses. The performance dashboard helps us track marketing ROI effectively.
